name: 100 Days Offensive
description: 100 Days Offensive is a 2.5d, singleplayer, ww1 game that is based on the game stickwars. It was made in 3 weeks by Isaac Howard, Tyler Cook, and Josh Balian and is our first game in Unity. It was made for our Computer Game Programming class in highschool. Gameplay currently consists of capturing flags by using tactically timed charges and mortar attacks, along with a slew of other abilities,to bleed away the ai's base health.
